content: When I listen to Bach's Goldberg Variations played by Glenn Gould, I wonder if the composer himself also performed with such virtuosity this wonderful musical piece.
translations: ita:Quando ascolto le Variazioni Goldberg di Bach, eseguite da Glenn Gould, mi chiedo se anche il compositore stesso abbia e
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
